name: Zindani
title: Old Phone Saling Website
desc1: Users view Category wise product details and order the product . Also can report the product.
desc2: Sellers add their products, view their products, Admin manage Users, and take action on Reported Items.
desc3: System is Fully Responsive and Authenticated By Google Firebase Authentication.
tools: TailwindCSS, DaisyUI, ES6, ReactJs,ExpressJs, NodeJs, MongoDB, Firebase,

name: Hoom Cooking
title: Hoom Food Saling Website
desc1: It is a homemade food selling website. Here you can login and sign in with firebase.
desc2: If you want, you can prepare food and add service. Click on add service route.
desc3: Also you can review each product by clicking on its details. And you can see your review.
tools: React.js, React Router, Daisy UI, Firebase, Node js, Express js, MongoDB

name: E-LEARNING
title: Course Saling Website
desc1: This web course website can log in and sign in. After logging in you can buy the course.
desc2: After log in you can buy the course. You can do dark and light themes on this website.
desc3: And you can click on this website details and then you can download the PDF automatically..
tools: React.js, React Router, React-to-PDF,  Firebase, Daisy
